my favorite band used to be toto.
my friends do not call my by my real name.

participant_2.background:
I try to do my laundry every week, but it doesn't always happen.
i live in pittsburgh.
i hate mexican food.
I think the most difficult thing I've ever done is balancing school and my job.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out with my cats.
I love cats! What are their names?
I have 2 cats, their names are Mittens and Shadow.
Those are adorable names! I'm glad you have cats to keep you company.
Thanks! They do keep me company, especially when I'm feeling down.
I can imagine. I'm a big fan of sci-fi space adventures. Do you like reading books about that?
Yes! I love reading sci-fi books. I've read a lot of them over the years.
Me too! I love the way they transport me to another world.
Me too! I especially love the ones that have a lot of action and adventure.
I agree! Those are the best. What's your favorite sci-fi book?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorites. I think I'd have to say Dune.
Dune is a great choice! I love that book too
